50#ifndef AM_HAL_FLASH_H
51#define AM_HAL_FLASH_H

61//*****************************************************************************
62//
64//
65//*****************************************************************************
66#define AM_HAL_FLASH_PROGRAM_KEY 0x12344321
67#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_KEY 0xD894E09E
68
69
70
71//*****************************************************************************
72//
74//
75//*****************************************************************************
76#define AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_ADDR SRAM_BASEADDR
77#define AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_SIZE (768 * 1024)
78#define AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR (AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_ADDR + AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_SIZE - 1)
79#define AM_HAL_FLASH_DTCM_START AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_ADDR
80#define AM_HAL_FLASH_DTCM_END (AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_ADDR + (64 * 1024) - 1)
81
82
83//*****************************************************************************
84//
86//
89//
90//*****************************************************************************
91#define AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR 0x00000000
92#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INSTANCE_SIZE ( 512 * 1024 )
93#define AM_HAL_FLASH_NUM_INSTANCES 4
94#define AM_HAL_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE ( 8 * 1024 )
95#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SIZE AM_HAL_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE
96#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INSTANCE_PAGES ( AM_HAL_FLASH_INSTANCE_SIZE / AM_HAL_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE )
97#define AM_HAL_FLASH_TOTAL_SIZE ( AM_HAL_FLASH_INSTANCE_SIZE * AM_HAL_FLASH_NUM_INSTANCES )
98#define AM_HAL_FLASH_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR ( AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR + AM_HAL_FLASH_TOTAL_SIZE - 1 )
99#define AM_HAL_FLASH_APPL_ADDR 0xC000
100
101//
104//
105#define ISADDRSRAM(x) ((x >= AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_ADDR) && \
106 (x <= (AM_HAL_FLASH_SRAM_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR & ~0x3)))
107#if AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR == 0x0
108#define ISADDRFLASH(x) (x <= (AM_HAL_FLASH_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR & ~0x3))
109#else
110#define ISADDRFLASH(x) ((x >= AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR) && \
111 (x <= (AM_HAL_FLASH_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR & ~0x3)))
112#endif
113
114//
116//
117#define AM_HAL_FLASH_ROW_WIDTH_BYTES (512)
118
119//
121//
122#define AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR2INST(addr) ( ( addr >> 19 ) & (AM_HAL_FLASH_NUM_INSTANCES - 1) )
123
124//
126//
127#define AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR2PAGE(addr) ( ( addr >> 13 ) & 0x3F )
128
129//
131//
132#define AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR2ABSPAGE(addr) ( addr >> 13 )
133
134//*****************************************************************************
135//
149//
150//*****************************************************************************
151#define CYCLESPERITER (AM_HAL_CLKGEN_FREQ_MAX_MHZ / 3)
152#define FLASH_CYCLES_US(n) ((n * CYCLESPERITER) + 0)
153#define FLASH_CYCLES_US_NOCACHE(n) ( (n == 0) ? 0 : (n * CYCLESPERITER) - 5)
154
155//
157//
158#define am_hal_flash_program_otp am_hal_flash_program_info
159#define am_hal_flash_program_otp_sram am_hal_flash_program_info_sram
160
161//*****************************************************************************
162//
167//
168//*****************************************************************************
169typedef struct am_hal_flash_helper_struct
170{
171 //
172 // The basics.
173 //
174 int (*flash_mass_erase)(uint32_t, uint32_t);
175 int (*flash_page_erase)(uint32_t, uint32_t, uint32_t);
176 int (*flash_program_main)(uint32_t, uint32_t *, uint32_t *, uint32_t);
177 int (*flash_program_info_area)(uint32_t, uint32_t, uint32_t *, uint32_t, uint32_t);
178
179 //
180 // Non-blocking variants, but be careful these are not interrupt safe so
181 // mask interrupts while these very long operations proceed.
182 //
183 int (*flash_mass_erase_nb)(uint32_t, uint32_t);
184 int (*flash_page_erase_nb)(uint32_t, uint32_t, uint32_t);
185 int (*flash_page_erase2_nb)( uint32_t value, uint32_t address);
186 bool (*flash_nb_operation_complete)(void);
187
188 //
189 // Useful utilities.
190 //
191 uint32_t (*flash_util_read_word)( uint32_t *);
192 void (*flash_util_write_word)( uint32_t *, uint32_t);
193 void (*bootrom_delay_cycles)(uint32_t ui32Cycles);
194
195 //
196 // Essentially these are recovery options.
197 //
198 int (*flash_info_erase)( uint32_t, uint32_t);
199 int (*flash_info_plus_main_erase)( uint32_t, uint32_t);
200 int (*flash_info_plus_main_erase_both)( uint32_t value);
201 int (*flash_recovery)( uint32_t value);
202
203 //
204 // The following functions pointers will generally never be called from
205 // user programs. They are here primarily to document these entry points
206 // which are usable from a debugger or debugger script.
207 //
208 void (*flash_program_main_from_sram)(void);
209 void (*flash_program_info_area_from_sram)(void);
210 void (*flash_erase_main_pages_from_sram)(void);
211 void (*flash_mass_erase_from_sram)(void);
212 void (*flash_info_erase_from_sram)(void);
213 void (*flash_info_plus_main_erase_from_sram)(void);
214 void (*flash_nb_operation_complete_from_sram)(void);
215 void (*flash_page_erase2_nb_from_sram)(void);
216 void (*flash_recovery_from_sram)(void);
217
218} g_am_hal_flash_t;
219extern const g_am_hal_flash_t g_am_hal_flash;
220
221//*****************************************************************************
222//
224//
225//*****************************************************************************
226#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_ADDR 0x50020000
227#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_O 0x10
228#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_WRITPROT_O 0x40
229#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_COPYPROT_O 0x50
230
231#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ADDR (AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_ADDR + AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_O)
232#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_WRITPROT_ADDR (AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_ADDR + AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_WRITPROT_O)
233#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_COPYPROT_ADDR (AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_ADDR + AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_COPYPROT_O)
234#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_CUST_TRIM_ADDR (AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_ADDR + 0x14)
235
236//
240//
241#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SIGNATURE0 0x48EAAD88
242#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SIGNATURE1 0xC9705737
243#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SIGNATURE2 0x0A6B8458
244#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SIGNATURE3 0xE41A9D74
245
246//
248//
249#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_DEBUGGERPROT_S 0
250#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_SWOCTRL_S 1
251#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_SRAMWIPE_S 2
252#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_FLASHWIPE_S 3
253#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ENINFOPRGM_S 4
254#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ENINFOERASE_S 8
255#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_BOOTLOADERSPIN_S 9
256
257#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_DEBUGGERPROT_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_DEBUGGERPROT_S))
258#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_SWOCTRL_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_SWOCTRL_S))
259#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_SRAMWIPE_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_SRAMWIPE_S))
260#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_FLASHWIPE_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_FLASHWIPE_S))
261#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ENINFOPRGM_M ((uint32_t)(0xF << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ENINFOPRGM_S))
262#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ENINFOERASE_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_ENINFOERASE_S))
263#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_BOOTLOADERSPIN_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_BOOTLOADERSPIN_S))
264#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_DEEPSLEEP_M ((uint32_t)(0x1 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_BOOTLOADERSPIN_S))
265#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_DEEPSLEEP ((uint32_t)(0x0 << AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_SECURITY_BOOTLOADERSPIN_S))
266
267//
272//
273#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_CHUNKSIZE (16*1024)
274
275#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_CHUNK2ADDR(n) (AM_HAL_FLASH_ADDR + (n << 14))
276#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_CHUNK2INST(n) ((n >> 5) & 1
277#define AM_HAL_FLASH_INFO_ADDR2CHUNK(n) ((n) >> 14)
